CustomField.description: Lets the ISR enter free form additional information for why they set customer sentiment to what it is.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Explain your choices for Customer Business Value and Customer Moving Off Product. IMPORTANT: If you selected AT RISK or STARTED MOVING OFF PRODUCT or HAS UNRESOLVED CONCERNS: **PROVIDE EVIDENCE FOR YOUR CONCLUSION** - a link to a logged call or email or both.
CustomField.label: Customer Sentiment Details
